name: Road Invaders
description:
A match 2 action game. Made for portable game console GameShell.

Instructions:

  • Move car and punch cubes
  • Match cubes to SHIFT gear
  • Get high score!
  • Stick to the end and beat those invaders!

GameShell Controls:

  • Arrow: move car
  • START: pause game
  • ESC: exit game

Keyboard Controls:

  • Arrow: move car
  • Enter: pause game
  • ESC: exit game

Please run under LIMA driver on GameShell.

Credit

Soundtrack The Slavedriver - By Frelon-K

SFX 《节拍战士：念》开发者 - 流贾君（Liujiajun）

SFX Swiss Arcade Game Entertainment

Font & Palette: PICO-8

Special thanks to Xieye and Cony
